channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Live: Wimbledon 2025
channel.desc: Live coverage from Wimbledon continues, with the best tennis players in the world trying to take a step closer to the most prestigious title in the sport. At this point in 2024, fans on Centre Court were treated to a thrilling match between American Taylor Fritz and Germany's Alexander Zverev, with Fritz coming from two sets down to win a see-saw contest lasting three and a half hours.
